# HabitApp
## Aplikasi Android bertema Habit Tracker App

[![forthebadge made-with-python](https://forthebadge.com/images/badges/built-for-android.svg)](https://www.python.org/)

Mengerjakan proyek submission Android dengan tema Habit Tracker App. 

[![Maven](https://badgen.net/badge/icon/maven?icon=maven&label)](https://https://maven.apache.org/)  ![Love](https://img.shields.io/badge/Love-pink?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

## TODO :boom: ?
- [X] RecyclerView shows list properly with initial data from local JSON.
- [X] Sorting menu working properly with the right query.
- [X] Count down text shows properly.
- [X] The notification appears when the time of count down is up.
- [X] Success to delete data by swiping the list.
- [X] Success to add new data
- [X] Random habit shows properly using ViewPager2.
- [X] Dark Mode working properly when the ListPreference is changed
- [X] UI testing can run successfully based on the scenario.
- [X] Every question in the exit interview has been answered correctly.

## Tech
- [Kotlin](https://kotlinlang.org/) - Modern, concise and safe programming language
- [Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio?gclid=Cj0KCQiAsoycBhC6ARIsAPPbeLveS74Jr239Xd4KdpyMBSQIIh7gKESSpYNXJCDyszioJ8bsSuZ28wwaAs0HEALw_wcB&gclsrc=aw.ds) - Get the official Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for Android app development.
- [Gradle](https://gradle.org/) - From mobile apps to microservices, from small startups to big enterprises, Gradle helps teams build, automate and deliver better software, faster.
- [XML](https://www.xml.com/) - XML is a markup language much like HTML
